output.sentences: It's finally here costume day, the kids look excited.
The kids put time and thought into their costumes, there's a Batman, Spiderman looks cool sitting on the bench.
There a setup where pictures can be taken of all the costumes, making it an unforgettable day.
Looks like there are tasty dishes, treats, snacks to choose from.
I see rides and different acitivities to take part in, this is going to be a fun day!
